definitions.definition: The gradual expansion of a product's scope until it becomes a bloated mess that solves everyone's problems except the original one.
definitions.usage: We started building a todo app but now it's a full CRM with AI integration. Classic Feature Creep.
definitions.author: Template Contributor

definitions.definition: When your MVP becomes a Frankenstein's monster of 'just one more feature' requests.
definitions.usage: The client asked for email notifications, so we added a social media platform. Feature Creep strikes again.
definitions.author: Anonymous Contributor
